descriptionHtml:
[font=Verdana][b][color=#00ff00]----Overview----[/color][/b]
Ra'Masser is a small community of Khajiit that has put down roots beneath Riften. Ra'Masser is accessible just inside the main entrance to Riften. When first loading into the city, make a left and the entrance is before the gate.

[/font][color=#ffff00]Please remember to come back and endorse if you enjoy the mod![/color][font=Verdana]

[b][color=#00ff00]----Features----[/color][/b]
All crafting benches available in vanilla Skyrim and Hearthfire
Buyable access from Honeyside
Custom NPC's
Merchants
Multi-skill trainers
Tracked crime

[b][color=#00ff00]----Planned Changes/Additions----[/color][/b]
Custom quest
Custom followers
Khajiit children
Voiced NPC's

[b][color=#00ff00]----Requirements----[/color][/b]
Hearthfire.esm
Update.esm
[color=#ffffff][url=http://skse.silverlock.org/][color=#ffffff][i]SKSE[/i][/color][/url] [/color]- for some of the scripts to work.

[b][color=#00ff00]----Permissions----[/color][/b]
Do not re-upload to other sites (but feel free to message me with suggestions of them).
Do not use any parts of this mod without permission.

[b][color=#00ff00]----Changelog----[/color][/b]
Version 0.01b
+ Alchemist Shop
+ Librarian/Alchemist Shop

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56089/?tab=12&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodchangelog%2F%3Fid%3D56089%26v%3D&pUp=1][color=#ffffff][i]Click to view all changes

files.name: TNB_RaMasser_0_01a
files.changelogHtml:
* Initial Upload
+ Mapmarker
+ Main hall (not cluttered)
+ Alchemist Shop (roughly cluttered)
+ Alchemist Vendor/Trainer
+ Alchemy bench

files.name: TNB_RaMasser_0_02a
files.changelogHtml:
+ Alchemy Trainer (need to change to Master level)
+ Clutter (alchemist shop)

files.name: TNB_RaMasser_0_06a
files.changelogHtml:
* Fixed NavMesh in Alchemist Shop
+ Library Room

files.name: TNB_RaMasser_0_08a
files.changelogHtml:
* Updated NavMesh
* Fixed misc. architecture errors
* Changed vendor counters from bars to common counters
+ Enchanting Room

files.name: TNB_RaMasser_0_09a
files.changelogHtml:
+ Blacksmith Room
+ Bakery/Misc Shop
+ Player Home (2nd floor, rough)

files.name: TNB_RaMasser_0_10a
files.changelogHtml:
* Updated NavMesh
+ Created vendor chests (blacksmith, misc, enchanting)
+ Bed and chest to player floor, locked door

files.name: TNB_RaMasser_0_11a
files.changelogHtml:
* Minor architecture fixes
* Started work on script to sort player inventory into chests
+ Mannequins/Weapon Racks (Player Floor)
+ Named storage containers (Player Floor)

files.name: TNB_RaMasser_0_13a
files.changelogHtml:
*** Last update before moving to Beta ***
* Complete restart in 0.01b - mod has become disorganized with too many bugs
